Keywords: midjourney, MJ, Discord, v6, stylize, chaos, artistic
Strengths: Artistic interpretation, consistent style, excellent composition, great for concepts
Limitations: No API, Discord-only, limited control, no inpainting in v6
Best Practices: Multi-prompt weighting cat::2; use /describe for reverse prompting; --style raw for photorealism

Keywords: dalle, dall-e, openai, gpt-4, natural language, API
Prompt Style: Natural language description without parameters. Be descriptive, conversational.
Key Parameters: HD quality (in prompt), vivid style (in prompt), natural size (in prompt)
Strengths: Excellent text rendering, natural language understanding, API access, safety guardrails
Limitations: Limited style control, no parameters, no negative prompts, can refuse prompts
Best Practices: Write like describing to a human; specify text content, font, placement explicitly; avoid keyword lists

Keywords: SD, SDXL, ComfyUI, A1111, local, open source, LoRA
Key Parameters: CFG Scale (7-12), Sampler (DPM++), Steps (20-50), LoRA, Embeddings, Weights (word:1.2)
Strengths: Full control, local/private, LoRAs, inpainting, ControlNet, customizable
Limitations: Learning curve, requires hardware, quality varies by model
Best Practices: Use (word:1.2) for emphasis; negative prompts essential; CFG 7-12; DPM++ 2M Karras sampler

Keywords: flux, schnell, dev, pro, BFL, open source, fast
Strengths: Fast generation, good quality, natural prompts, open weights
Limitations: Newer platform, fewer resources, limited community models
Best Practices: Use natural descriptions; specify style directly; guidance scale 3.5 for balanced results

Keywords: nano banana, gemini, google, imagen, multimodal, text rendering
Prompt Style: Narrative paragraphs. 32K context. ALL CAPS emphasis. Hex colors #9F2B68.
Strengths: Best text rendering, multimodal input (14 images), search grounding, thinking mode
Limitations: Newer platform, learning curve, style consistency
Best Practices: Narrative > keywords; ALL CAPS for critical; hex colors for precision; NEVER for negatives; photography terms anchor quality

Keywords: imagen, google, photorealistic, high quality, commercial
Prompt Style: Natural language, descriptive, aspect ratio in text
Key Parameters: Quality level, aspect ratio specified in prompt text
Strengths: Photorealistic quality, good text rendering, commercial use
Best Practices: Be descriptive; specify aspect in prompt text; use photography terminology

Keywords: veo, video, google, AI video, motion, cinematography

Key Parameters: Duration, camera movements (pan, tilt, dolly), scene transitions (cut, fade)
Strengths: Video generation, cinematography understanding, smooth motion
Best Practices: Use cinematography keywords; describe camera movements explicitly; include scene transitions

Keywords: ideogram, text, typography, logo, creative, accurate text

Limitations: Fewer style options, focused on text/design use cases
Best Practices: Describe text content precisely; specify font characteristics; great for logos and typography
